tools.title: JSON Studio
tools.description: Side-by-side JSON editor with diff, CSV import/export, Coralogix log reconstructor, and value extractor.

tools.title: TSV/CSV → JSON Converter
tools.description: Quick converter for tab-delimited (TSV) or simple CSV-like text to JSON.

tools.title: SQL Template Generator
tools.description: Generate many SQL statements from a CSV, replacing {placeholders} using column headers.

tools.title: API Key / Hash Generator
tools.description: Generate an HMAC-SHA256 hash from payerName + idap + timestamp + eat using a secret key.
